post:
Hi Folks,

Due to requests an adaptation has been made to the pricing plan on the 128mb XEN PV Plan.

[Netherlands]

2 CPU Cores Equal Share (Most nodes are now E3-1270 @ 3.4 GHz p/core)
128MB Ram
128MB Swap
7GB HDD (Raid 10)
300GB Bandwidth @ 1gbit (Incoming bandwidth not counted)
1 IP4 (instant rDNS via SolusVM)
5 IP6 (instant rDNS via SolusVM)
15GB Free offsite backup space (On request)

€7 p/quarter
€13 s/annually
€24 p/year

Order link: https://inceptionhosting.com/clients/cart.php?a=add&pid=48

Thanks for reading.

Anthony.
